type.name: org.gradle.api.ProjectState
type.description: * {@code ProjectState} provides information about the execution state of a project.

method.name: getExecuted
method.description:
*

Returns true if this project has been evaluated.

* * @return true if this project has been evaluated.

method.name: getFailure
method.description: * Returns the exception describing the project failure, if any. * * @return The exception, or null if project evaluation did not fail.

method.name: rethrowFailure
method.description: * Throws the project failure, if any. Does nothing if the project did not fail.

property.name: executed
property.description:
*

Returns true if this project has been evaluated.

* * @return true if this project has been evaluated.

property.name: failure
property.description: * Returns the exception describing the project failure, if any. * * @return The exception, or null if project evaluation did not fail.
